Episodes.Title: Get Me A Lawyer
Episodes.Plot: Attorney Patty Hewes hires a new associate, Ellen Parsons, to help her as she tries to ruin Arthur Frobisher. Hewes represents a group of employees that are suing Frobisher after he sold his company, leaving the employees devastated. Ellen is unaware that her best friend, Katie Connor, is working for Frobisher.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
Episodes.Writer: Todd A. Kessler, Glenn Kessler, Daniel Zelman
Episodes.GuestStars: Tom Aldredge, Robin Thomas, Victor Arnold, Donnie Keshawarz, Miriam Shor, Saundra Santiago, David Costabile, Joanna Rhinehart, Brian McCormack, Todd A. Kessler, Todd A. Kessler, Letty Serra, Casey Siemaszko, Maya

Episodes.Title: Jesus, Mary And Joe Cocker
Episodes.Plot: Ellen convinces Katie to testify against Arthur Frobisher, which has him considering drastic measures. Patty begins to question if Katie is giving honest and accurate testimony.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
Episodes.Writer: Todd A. Kessler, Glenn Kessler, Daniel Zelman
Episodes.GuestStars: Casey Siemaszko, Maya Days, Victor Arnold, Saundra Santiago, David Costabile, Ethan Herschenfeld, Kevin Isola, Damian Young, Matt Salinger, Vanessa Elese, Ryan Dunn, Ashley Marie Greiner, Elliot Korte, Peggy Gorml

Episodes.Title: And My Paralyzing Fear Of Death
Episodes.Plot: Patty receives a mysterious threat at her office that could destroy her case against Arthur Frobisher. Ellen continues to struggle with the demands of her new job at Hewes and Associates.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
Episodes.Writer: Glenn Kessler, Daniel Zelman, Todd A. Kessler
Episodes.GuestStars: Real Andrews, Neal Matarazzo, Michael Stuhlbarg, Nestor Serrano, Jeffrey M. Marchetti, Mick O'Rourke, Marc Aden Gray, John E. Mack, Mark Zimmerman, Zachary Booth, Linda Powell, Jack Gilpin, Peter McRobbie, Donnie

Episodes.Title: Tastes Like A Ho Ho
Episodes.Plot: Katie is getting ready for her upcoming deposition in the Frobisher case while Gregory withholds information that could be even more important that Katie's.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Steven Gilborn, Michael Gaston, Robin Thomas, Kevin Isola, Carmen Goodine, Mackenzie Connolly, Jeremy Shamos

Episodes.Title: A Regular Earl Anthony
Episodes.Plot: Tom Shayes considers his options as Patty continues to strain to keep her clients happy. Arthur tells Ray that he needs to put more pressure on Patty to make the case go away.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
Episodes.Writer: Todd A. Kessler, Glenn Kessler, Daniel Zelman, Mark F
Episodes.GuestStars: Robin Thomas, Jennifer Roszell, Natalie Venetia Belcon, Jennifer Missoni, Jimmy Burke, Sarah Viccellio, Carla Occhiogrosso, John Cenatiempo, Donal Logue, Debra Monk, Michael Angelo

Episodes.Title: She Spat At Me
Episodes.Plot: Patty tries to find out what Gregory knows about the case. Arthur Frobisher tries a new strategy to save his family and his money. David and Ellen have strains on their relationship as Lila tries to reenter David's life.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Zachary Booth, Joanne Lamstein, Sarita Choudhury, Jennifer Missoni, Michael Pemberton, Madison Arnold, Elliot Korte, Josh Pais, Peter McRobbie

Episodes.Title: We Are Not Animals
Episodes.Plot: Tom and Ellen think that Patty is trying to control them so they decide to make an alliance and keep information from her. Patty must keep Gregory Malina secure until his deposition because her case will fall apart without it.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Blame The Victim
Episodes.Plot: Ellen gets some bad news from her parents. Arthur Frobisher and his team do everything they can to keep things going their way while a witness remains missing.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Do You Regret What We Did?
Episodes.Plot: Patty Hewes and Arthur Frobisher continue to struggle for dominance as the deposition nears.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
Episodes.Writer: Daniel Zelman, Glenn Kessler, Todd A. Kessler
Episodes.GuestStars: Todd A. Kessler, Donna Murphy, Anastasia Griffith

Episodes.Title: Sort Of Like A Family
Episodes.Plot: Ellen tries to get herself back into the mix as Patty and Frobisher fight it out at the deposition.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: I Hate These People
Episodes.Plot: Patty offers Ellen her job back, however,  Ellen declines but volunteers to keep helping Patty with the Frobisher case.  Lila is back, and bringing more havoc into David and Ellen's lives.  Patty uses the newly acquired evidence to blackmail Ray, and offers him an ultimatum.

Episodes.Title: There's No 'We' Anymore
Episodes.Plot: Patty finally posts bail for Ellen as Frobisher learns about a tape made by Gregory Malina that could ruin him.
Episodes.Writer: Daniel Zelman, Todd A. Kessler, Glenn Kessler
Episodes.GuestStars: Garret Dillahunt, Peter McRobbie, David Costabile, Carmen Goodine, Damian Young, Todd A. Kessler, Ethan Herschenfeld, Glenn Kessler, Michael Nouri, Donnie Keshawarz, Mario Van Peebles

Episodes.Title: Because I Know Patty
Episodes.Plot: The first season ends with Ellen talking Patty into defending her in exchange for the Gregory Malina videotape.
Episodes.Writer: Daniel Zelman, Glenn Kessler, Todd A. Kessler
Episodes.GuestStars: Elliot Korte, Garret Dillahunt, Todd A. Kessler
